attributes.action: Nominate Ned Stephan for an OBE for 'Services to Sport'.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to all Neds efforts in establishing himself as a known and quality footballer in the Chester area he has brought on the youth in the surrounding district.  This development has even been with the lack of skill but overcome with total effort and dedication to reach the pinnacle of his career. His now renown status at Boughton Hall Cricket Club is a great example of community spirit.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
